body:
Comment 8 by **czarek.tomczak**: 
Unforunately Go tip doesn't work. When building app I get error "unknown flag -pack":

    C:\cef2go\cef2go>go build -o Release/cef2go.exe src/main_windows.go
    # command-line-arguments
    C:\Go\pkg\tool\windows_386\8g.exe: unknown flag -pack

I will try to build Go 1.2 from sources and print the err.
